content: अवच्छेदः {@--1@} A part, portion, ( अवयव). {@--2@} Boundary, limit. {@--3@} Separation. {@--4@} Distinction, distinguishing, particularization (as by attributes). {@--5@} Determination, decision, settlement; शब्दार्थस्यानवच्छेदे विशेषस्मृतिहेतवः <ls>Vāk. P.</ls> {@--6@} That property of a thing which distinguishes it from every thing else, a characteristic property. {@--7@} Bounding, defining. {@--8@} Pervading (व्याप्तिः). °अवच्छेदः generalizing, removing distinctions.
